channel.title: Thieving problem
channel.description:
I am having a problem with thieving. When I try to steal from cake stall, I get this:
[code]Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method482(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1618) at client.method105(client.java:9526) at client.method18(client.java:92) at client.method102(client.java:8801) at client.method9(client.java:9963) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:121) at client.run(client.java:5017) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]
Any thoughts???
